00072   void readFrom(istream& _is)
00073   {
00074     // of course you should read the fitness first!
00075     EO<FitT>::readFrom(_is);
00076     // START Code of input
00077 
00082     unsigned s;
00083     _is >> s;
00084     b.resize(s);
00085     for (unsigned i=0; i<s; i++)
00086       {
00087         bool bTmp;
00088         _is >> bTmp;
00089         b[i] = bTmp;
00090       }                 
00091     // END   Code of input
00092   }
